content:
The Stanford Institute for Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence is organising a second virtual conference on COVID19 on 1st June 2020.
https://hai.stanford.edu/events/covid-ai-road-ahead?utm_source=Stanford+University&utm_campaign=5c1e035982-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_2020_05_19_10_59&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_aaf04f4a4b-5c1e035982-64696599

COVID + AI: The Road Ahead
Live Virtual Event Two months into the COVID-19 pandemic, we see curves flattening and cities lifting shelter restrictions. By no means is this pandemic over; and yet, policymakers, researchers, medical practitioners, and industry are starting to grapple with how we operate in a post-COVID world. What is the path forward, economically, medically, and culturally?

AI Governance Forum: From the governance of AI to the governance via AI?

The AI Transparency Institute is glad to invite you to join the AI Governance Forum that will be held remotely on the 8th and 9th of June 2020.

Confirmed speakers are Prof. Yoshua Bengio, Joanna Bryson, as well as representatives of EU Commission. OECD, Unesco, Microsoft Research and Facebook.

On Monday 8th there will be a Panel on AI and Healthcare

Moderator
Ricardo Chavarriaga, member of the CLAIRE COVID19 taskforce

Panelists

  • Ulises Cortés (Barcelona Supercomputing Center)
  • Danielle Belgrave (Microsoft Research)
  • Amandeep Singh Gill (I-DAIR, Graduate Institute Geneva)
  • Anne Cambon-Thomsen (CNRS, Research Data Alliance)
  • Yi Zeng (Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence)
  • Karim Berkouk (EU Commission)

Website : https://ai-gf.com

The CLAIRE AI & COVID-19 initiative – Approach, experiences and recommendations – Euro DIG 2020
CLAIRE Task Force on AI & COVID-19 will participate in "Euro DIG 2020- European Dialogue on Internet Governance" to present the initiative and the results of the group T4-Bioninformatics.
The Talk will be on 12th June at about 13.00 CET streaming live from "STudio The Hague".

https://eurodigwiki.org/wiki/The_CLAIRE_AI_%26_COVID-19_initiative_%E2%80%93_Approach,_experiences_and_recommendations_%E2%80%93_BigStage_2020

https://www.eurodig.org/index.php?id=76
